text: Vnimayushchiye lzhi, pozhirayushchiye zapretnoye! Yesli pridut k tebe [takiye na sud], to rassudi ikh ili zhe otvernis' ot nikh. Yesli ty otvernesh'sya ot nikh, oni ne smogut povredit' tebe v chem-libo. Yesli zhe stanesh' vynosit' sudebnoye resheniye, to sudi ikh po spravedlivosti. Voistinu, Allakh lyubit spravedlivykh
